title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: Classic 35mm film rangefinder camera produced by Leica from 1954 to 1966, highly sought after by collectors.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Iconic vintage Gibson SG with classic double-cutaway design, known for its role in rock history.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: Apple’s first Macintosh computer, introduced in 1984, a revolutionary piece of computing history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Luxury diving watch from Rolex, stainless steel with black dial and rotating bezel, renowned for durability and prestige.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Rare first edition of F. Scott Fitzgerald’s timeless classic, a centerpiece for literary collectors.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Authentic Eames lounge chair with ottoman, an iconic piece of mid-century modern furniture design.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Rare signed screen print by Banksy, showcasing the artist’s satirical and thought-provoking style.
